title: [Castle Varunar, Keep]
description: A small room interrupts the spiraling stone stairs.  In a carved-out niche in the rock, a small torch sputters softly.  A small table and a single chair are the room's only furnishing.  In the flickering light you notice numerous bloody handprints stain the walls.
